code: import React from"react";import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import{FiCpu,FiSliders,FiCode,FiBarChart2,FiImage,FiFileText,FiGlobe}from"react-icons/fi";import"./Sidebar.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Sidebar(_ref){let{menuOpen,setMenuOpen}=_ref;const location=useLocation();const links=[{path:"/models",label:"Model Hub",icon:FiCpu},{path:"/training",label:"Custom Model Training",icon:FiSliders},{path:"/sql-trainer",label:"SQL Trainer",icon:FiCode},{path:"/analysis",label:"File Analytics",icon:FiBarChart2},{path:"/ocr",label:"Image OCR",icon:FiImage},{path:"/rag",label:"Chat with Document",icon:FiFileText},{path:"/translation",label:"Translate & Summarize",icon:FiGlobe},{path:"/code-fix",label:"Code Fix",icon:FiCode}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("aside",{className:"sidebar ".concat(menuOpen?"expanded":"collapsed"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-content",children:links.map(_ref2=>{let{path,label,icon:Icon}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:path,className:location.pathname===path?"active":"","aria-label":label,onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(false),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"sidebar-icon","aria-hidden":"true"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"sidebar-label",children:label})]},path);})})});}
